page.title: 19Recreation- Childrens groups
page.content: In Skirlaugh on Mondays and Wednesdays lots of girls meet either in the village hall or the school for brownies.Brownies play games and sing songs. After Monday brownies guides starts.This is very much like brownies but it is for older girls about the age of ten.In guides they do a bit of writing and not so many games as brownies do . On friday night there is a youth club.To join you have to be over ten there's a snooker table,darts,table tennis and a disco room.Next to the antique shop there is a small building which is called the reading room,but it's used for snooker.There is a junior snooker club and a club for people over sixteen.{ { }
